name: Multi-Agent Router
description: A multi-agent coordinator that routes requests to specialized agents for weather information and mathematical calculations.

skills.name: Weather Information
skills.description: Get current weather conditions, temperature, humidity, and wind speed for any location worldwide.

skills.name: Mathematical Calculations
skills.description: Perform arithmetic calculations, trigonometry, logarithms, and algebraic expressions.

skills.name: Unit Conversions
skills.description: Convert between units of length (km, miles, feet), temperature (C, F, K), and weight (kg, lbs).

skills.name: General Conversation
skills.description: Handle greetings, capability questions, and general conversational queries.
